column6: REALM OF KINGS. Guest-starring Magus! Star-Lord and the Guardians risked everything and suffered terrible losses in their epic, cross-time battle with Adam Warlock's evil half. Except...everything they - and you - know could be wrong.
column8: | writer:Dan Abnett | writer:Andy Lanning | letterer:Joe Caramagna | penciller:Wes Craig | penciller:Alex Garner
